title: Redesign website interface

requirements.text: Design and implement a new visual theme for the website with a distinct aesthetic that differs from the current warm earth tones, including updated color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling
acceptanceCriteria: New color scheme is applied consistently across all pages
Typography is updated with new font choices and sizing
Component styling (buttons, cards, forms) follows the new design language
Theme works in both light and dark modes
Navigation header reflects the new design
Product cards and catalog layout use the new styling

requirements.text: Update the product catalog page layout and structure to improve visual appeal and user experience while maintaining all existing functionality (viewing products, adding to cart)
acceptanceCriteria: Product grid layout is refreshed with new spacing and arrangement
Product cards have updated visual design
Hero banner section is redesigned or replaced
All existing product catalog functionality continues to work

requirements.text: Redesign the admin dashboard interface including the products management page and orders page to improve usability and visual consistency with the new theme
acceptanceCriteria: Admin products page has updated layout and styling
Admin orders page reflects the new design language
Product management forms and controls are visually updated
All admin functionality (add, edit, delete products, view orders) remains functional

requirements.text: Update the checkout and order confirmation pages to match the new interface design while preserving all existing functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Order confirmation page reflects new design
Cart display and cart button match new theme
All checkout workflow functionality continues to work

constraints: Do not modify backend logic or data structures
Preserve all existing functionality including authentication, cart operations, and admin features
Do not edit immutable frontend files: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and components/ui directory
nonGoals: Changing the backend API or data models
